text: How many women have the courage to start properly with a cold, cold bath early in the morning? I jump in, throw the water, cold as ice, and after the first plunge I am happy.
author: Anna Held

text: I am not a morning person.
author: Laurell K. Hamilton

text: I couldn't wait for the sun to come up the next morning so that I could get out on the course again.
author: Ben Hogan

text: Whereas I used to get depressed or neurotic or dwell on things, I see my son's bright eyes and smile in the morning, and suddenly, I don't feel like I'm depressed anymore. There's nothing to be depressed about when you've got that.
author: Corey Feldman

text: Most of the top actors and actresses may be working in ten or twelve films at the same time, so they will give one director two hours and maybe shoot in Bombay in the morning and Madras in the evening. It happens.
author: Satyajit Ray
